name: Creating Arrows in Figma
description:
There are lots of ways to create bespoke arrows. This is a definitive guide that explores the many different methods and techniques you can use to create arrows in Figma.

Topics covered:

Creating an Arrow
The Zero Height Trick
Arrow Caps
Positioning the Cap Artwork
Making New Caps
Changing the Resize Point
The Faux Line Technique
Changing the Stroke
Creating Flows
Interchangeable Parts
Using Bolean Groups
